88 
 
DEGREE AWARDING  
INSTITUTIONS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME    
UTME SUBJECTS  
    Commerce, Business Methods, Statistics, 
Government or Economics.  
(iv) LAUTECH requires any other two (2) Science 
subjects  from  Physics,  Chemistry 
 or  
Biology/Agricultural Science.  
(v) RSUST and EBSU – Same as in Accountancy.  
(vi) UNIZIK- Economics is not compulsory.  
  
 LOCAL  GOVERNMENT  
ADMINISTRATION   
 OAU      
  
 LOCAL  GOVERNMENT  AND  
DEVELOPMENT STUDIES  
ABU    
Two (2) 'A' level/IJMB 
passes one (1) of which 
must include Government 
or History.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes 
including English 
Language, Government 
or History, Economics 
and any other two (2) 
subjects and at least a 
pass in Mathematics.  
  
Government/History, 
Economics and any 
other subject.  
  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
  
 (i)  OAU accepts  
a) two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Economics, 
Government, History or Geography.  
b) ND upper credit in Public Administration, 
Business Administration, Statistics and 
Accountancy or University Diploma in  
 Public  Administration  or  Local  
Government with merit pass.  
c) holders of ND in Local Government 
Studies from recognized Institutions at 
upper credit Level (CGPA - 3.5 and above)  
d) in addition to a and b, applicants must 
have at least five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
in English Language, Mathematics, 
Government, and any other two (2) 
relevant subjects from Social Sciences or 
Arts subjects obtained at not more than 
two (2) sittings.  
  
  
UTME
